name: Save new ChargeOverÂ customers to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new customer is created in ChargeOver, Make will automatically add that customer to a new row in a Google Sheet spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1dVfWgyTnMADXPjnXppX1NqIYcoizWg0RJTuySDKv8XQ/edit?usp=sharing).
